data.title: Top Gun actress weds girlfriend
data.meta_description: Top Gun actress Kelly McGillis married her girlfriend in New Jersey, it has been reported.
data.text:
Top Gun actress Kelly McGillis married her girlfriend in New Jersey, it has been reported.

Kelly and Melanie Leis' civil union was performed in a municipal court in Collingswood on September 15.

Kelly, 53, is known for her role alongside Tom Cruise in Top Gun. She also starred in the films Witness and The Accused.

Her civil union partner is an executive with Independence Communications, a company that provides Muzak to businesses. The New York Times first reported their civil union.

Kelly, who lives in Collingswood, came out as a lesbian last year in an interview with SheWired.com. She has been married and divorced twice before and has two daughters.

Her latest film, Stake Land, had its debut last week at the Toronto International Film Festival.
